acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in a POJO with basic jvm types
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldGenerateBasicTypes

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.OneDimensionalTestPojo

Then the Pojo should contain some data
